=Migration to Class map=
===GRDelayedSend migration===
Renamed instance variable:
 * selector renamed to message
Classes affected:
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#GRDelayedSend GRDelayedSend]
====Implications====
No instances expect to exist, so SIMPLE migration is acceptable.
===JQButton migration===
Removed instance variable:
 * icons
Classes affected:
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#JQButton JQButton]
====Implications====
No instances expect to exist, so SIMPLE migration is acceptable.
===!SendMail migration===
Added instance variables:
 * plainMessage, rcptTo, user, password
Classes affected:
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SendMail SendMail]
====Implications====
No instances expect to exist, so SIMPLE migration is acceptable.
===SSCondition migration===
Changed superclass:
 * WAObject superclass changed to MACondition
Classes affected:
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSCondition SSCondition]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSPortCondition SSPortCondition]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSUniqueProjectIdCondition SSUniqueProjectIdCondition]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSProjectNameCondition SSProjectNameCondition]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSSizeCondition SSSizeCondition]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSUniqueGroupIdCondition SSUniqueGroupIdCondition]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSUniqueMemberLoginCondition SSUniqueMemberLoginCondition]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSYouAreMemberCondition SSYouAreMemberCondition]
====Implications====
There will be instances galore, but they are used in MADescription and we will flushing the MADescription cache after SIMPLE migration.
===SSMember migration===
Renamed instance variable:
 * description renamed to information
Classes affected:
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSMember SSMember]
====Implications====
Need to arrange to transfer state from description field to information field with DESCRIPTION migration (Issue 37). 

See also [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSModel_migration SSModel migration].

===SSModel migration===
New class instance variable:
 * stringsSatisfyBlocks
Classes affected:
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSAccessPolicy SSAccessPolicy]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSEmailSubscription SSEmailSubscription]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSFeedEntry SSFeedEntry]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSGemStoneProject SSGemStoneProject]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSGroup SSGroup]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSInstanceSideDescribedObject SSInstanceSideDescribedObject]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSIssue SSIssue]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSIssueReport SSIssueReport]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSMember SSMember]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSModel SSModel]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSProject SSProject]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSRepository SSRepository]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSSubscription SSSubscription]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSTag SSTag]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSVersion SSVersion]
====Implications====
There will be instances galore, but class instance variables are involved with no shape change for instances so SIMPLE migration suffices. 
====Exceptions====
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSGemStoneProject SSGemStoneProject] with [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSProject_migration SSProject migration]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSMember SSMember] with [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSMember_migration SSMember migration]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSProject SSProject] with [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSProject_migration SSProject migration]
In each of the above cases, the DESCRIPTION migration is appropriate. 
===SSProject migration===
Renamed instance variable:
 * description renamed to information
Classes affected:
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSGemStoneProject SSGemStoneProject]
 * [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSProject SSProject]
====Implications====
Need to arrange to transfer state from description field to information field with DESCRIPTION migration (Issue 37). 

See also [ChangedClassesSs3ToRc2#SSModel_migration SSModel migration].
